data.name: 14 Minesweeper Variants Demo
data.detailed_description:
The title explains what it is.

Features:
1. 14 minesweeper variants, each with four difficulties and a hundred levels.
2. Learning new rule sets and their unique logic.
3. In case you need to take notes, there are built-in drawing tools.
4. In case you get stuck, you may press F1 for a hint.
5. Every level can be completed by logic. Guessing is not required.

data.short_description: Minesweeper but the rules are changing.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
